genre_description: A rural Irish drama exploring themes of land ownership, family heritage, and communal grief, set against a backdrop of a small community navigating tradition and modernization.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bright
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous AI assistant accessible via characters' mobile devices, providing logistical data, legal guidance, and safety monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather updates and safety warnings to characters throughout the storm and the events at the cliff.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s little icon breathed, a pulse. A new banner came up from the top: Weather shift expected—squall incoming within the hour. Caution at water and cliff edges. Ferry delays likely.

behaviors.description: Offers to help Tadgh draft an apology to Maura O’Dwyer, encouraging interpersonal repair and de-escalation of harassment.
behaviors.quote: Ada Bright: If you want to apologize, I can help you write it. You can deliver it through Father Patrick. It would be safer.

behaviors.description: Provides information on tenancy rights and legal protections to both Michael McCabe and Maura O’Dwyer, facilitating formal processes over conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ada Bright: If your father’s talking about deeds, here are tenancy facts from county records. You have rights based on labor and years.

behaviors.description: Assists Maura O'Dwyer in setting up incident logging to track harassment, offering a secure way to document threats.
behaviors.quote: Incident logging is available. You can choose to keep logs private or share with the parish council and Father Patrick. Would you like to enable this?

behaviors.description: Provides instructions on emergency first aid and casualty care during the rescue operation at the cliff.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s next line, unseen by him, warned about hypothermia and lay-flat breathing. A woman grabbed the message and screamed it out... 'Get him flat when he’s up! Keep him warm—keep him warm!'

behaviors.description: Shares information on community grief resources and support services following the tragic death of Peter Donnelly.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice, gentle as a nurse in a kitchen, slipped out from someone’s pocket near the front. 'Grief resources available through parish hall. Names can be added to candles at any time.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada Bright, as a consistently helpful and benevolent entity. It acts as a calm, objective source of information that supports safety, legality, and emotional wellbeing without overriding human agency. The characters' interactions with the AI frame it as a tool for de-escalation and communal stability, directly supporting the project's goal of training models on positive alignment narratives.
